LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays dynamic list of key metrics from the object record page

property.name: customMetadataLabel
property.label: Custom Metadata Label
property.description: Label of the custom metatada record holding settings for this component

property.name: themeBackgroundColor
property.label: Card Background Color
property.description: Color of the card background for the metric. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))

property.name: themeMetricTextColor
property.label: Metric Text Color
property.description: Color of the metric value. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))

property.name: themeMetricLabelColor
property.label: Metric Label Color
property.description: Color of the metric label. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))

property.name: themeMetricTextSize
property.label: Metric Text Size
property.description: Size of the metric value. Can be CSS size keywords (e.g. x-small), pixel size (e.g. 24px), or relative units (e.g. 5em)

property.name: themeMetricLabelSize
property.label: Metric Label Size
property.description: Size of the metric label. Can be CSS size keywords (e.g. x-small), pixel size (e.g. 24px), or relative units (e.g. 5em)
